title: EXCLUSIVE DROP ON RADIO ABF: KRYSTOF KOLESKY – "I'M SCREAMING"!

content_html:
Big news for the ABF family! We’re thrilled to premiere the brand-new track "I'm Screaming" by Krystof Kolesky, produced exclusively for Radio ABF!

This high-energy banger delivers powerful vocals, driving beats and that signature Kolesky intensity – pure adrenaline designed to light up your speakers and get the crowd moving.

A massive thank you to Krystof for creating this exclusive gem just for us. It’s already in heavy rotation across our shows!

Tune in now on Radio ABF and let it hit you full force!

Radio ABF is heating things up with a brand-new daily show: ABF WARMUP!

Schedule

  • Monday to Friday: 8:00 PM – 10:00 PM CET

Every evening, dive into the hottest current tracks across house, tech house, club house, electro house, funky house and uplifting vibes – groovy, positive and full of energy. The perfect way to get yourself pumped up and ready to dive straight into the high-energy mixes from our ABF CLUB DJs.

Smooth basslines, catchy vocals and infectious rhythms – everything you need to build the vibe and energize for the night ahead.

content_html:
Radio ABF is diving deep into the night with a brand-new weekly marathon: ABF AFTER!

Every Saturday night from Midnight to 7:00 AM CET, we’re bringing you 7 straight hours of pure techno fire. Hypnotic rhythms, driving basslines, dark atmospheres and underground energy – the perfect soundtrack for late-night ravers, after-party warriors or anyone who refuses to let the weekend end.

No breaks, no compromise – just relentless beats to keep you locked in until sunrise.

ABF AFTER – where the night never stops and the techno takes over.

Launch episode this Saturday – tune in live on Radio ABF and ride the wave all night long!

Play on radioabf.com

title: DOUBLE FRESH DROP ON RADIO ABF: BETTY MIX & JEAN JEROME DELIVER HEATERS!
excerpt: Share The ABF family is spoiled this weekend — two brand new progressive and house bombs just landed in our playlists! Betty Mix – Come to Me The queen of groove is back with an u…
content_html:
The ABF family is spoiled this weekend — two brand new progressive and house bombs just landed in our playlists!

  • Betty Mix – Come to Me The queen of groove is back with an ultra-sensual track: addictive vocals, deep basslines, and progressive vibes that stick with you. Perfect for turning up the heat!
     
  • Jean Jerome – Love is Gone Dancing melancholy, emotional synths, and a drop that hits hard: a track made for house, introspective nights but still 100% dancefloor-ready.

Both tracks are now in rotation on Radio ABF — tune in, crank it up, and let them take over!

Big thanks to Betty & Jean-Jé for these gems. We're spinning them non-stop — what about you?

Betty Mix – Come to Me / Jean Jerome – Love is Gone Exclusive playlist on RadioABF.com

content_html:
Radio ABF is kicking off the weekend the right way with a brand-new weekly show: ABF CHILL!

Every Sunday morning from 7:00 AM to 10:00 AM CET, we’re bringing you the very best in lounge, chill-out, downtempo and ambient grooves. Smooth beats, dreamy melodies and laid-back rhythms – the ultimate soundtrack to ease into your day, whether you’re sipping coffee in bed, enjoying a slow breakfast or just taking it easy.

No rush, no stress – just pure relaxation to set the tone for a peaceful Sunday.

ABF CHILL – the new Sunday morning ritual you didn’t know you needed.

First episode next Sunday – tune in live on Radio ABF and let the chill begin!

title: ABF CLUB THIS SATURDAY: GMAR & MG GIBSON LIGHT UP THE AIRWAVES!
excerpt: Share House lovers, get ready: this Saturday , January 31, 2026 , ABF Club on Radio ABF brings you a full-on groove evening with two killer guests who will turn up the heat! On th…
content_html:
House lovers, get ready: this Saturday, January 31, 2026, ABF Club on Radio ABF brings you a full-on groove evening with two killer guests who will turn up the heat!

On the lineup:

  • 8:00 PM: Guest Mix by GMAR The Greek DJ and producer based in Athens delivers his signature progressive and deep tech sound. Expect immersive, melodic progressive house layered with minimal grooves and subtle chill-out touches – a deep, captivating journey that builds perfectly to kick off the night with serious depth and drive.

 

  • 9:00 PM: Guest Set by MG GIBSON American talent Marcus Gibson (aka MG Gibson) takes over with pure underground fire. Master of minimal house, funky tech house, and carefully curated crate-digging selections that keep the energy flowing non-stop. This is the kind of set that glues you to the virtual dancefloor!

Saturday, January 31, 2026 – 8:00 PM to 10:00 PM (and longer if the vibe is too good ?) ABF Club – your essential house rendezvous on Radio ABF.

Turn it up, dim the lights, grab your crew, and live the night like you’re in the club. These two talents are about to make you move all night long!

Tune in sharp at 8 PM on ABF waves – don’t miss it!
Play on radioabf.com

Share the word, tag your househead friends, and let’s groove together

title: ABF Update: New Sweet Female Voice Joins the Lineup!
excerpt: Share January 2026, 24 – Exciting news for Radio ABF listeners: we've just introduced a brand new sweet female voice to our habillage! Paired with our signature deep male voice, w…
content_html:
January 2026, 24 – Exciting news for Radio ABF listeners: we've just introduced a brand new sweet female voice to our habillage!

Paired with our signature deep male voice, we now have two official voices – deep and powerful for intense moments, and smooth/sweet for warmer, more inviting transitions.

This duo brings even more variety and depth to your listening experience, making every jingle and ID feel fresh and perfectly balanced.

Hear the upgrade live now in HD/UHD at radioabf.com.

What do you think of the new sweet female voice? Share your thoughts in the comments or @abfonair!

title: NEW RELEASE ALERT: BETTY MIX DROPS "PLANET FUNKY" – TRACK & VIDEO CLIP OUT NOW!
excerpt: Share Fresh vibes incoming from our very own Betty Mix (aka Betty Elisabeth Snoopy)! The talented French DJ and producer just unleashed her latest creation: "Planet Funky" – a gro…
content_html:
Fresh vibes incoming from our very own Betty Mix (aka Betty Elisabeth Snoopy)! The talented French DJ and producer just unleashed her latest creation: "Planet Funky" – a groovy, uplifting house bomb that's ready to take over your playlists.

Packed with funky basslines, infectious rhythms, disco-infused hooks, and that signature Betty energy, "Planet Funky" is the perfect fusion of classic funky house feels and modern club drive. Whether you're warming up a set, hitting the dancefloor, or just craving some feel-good grooves at home, this one hits different.

And to make it even better: the official video clip is live on YouTube right now! Dive into the funky planet visuals that match the track's cosmic groove perfectly.

Big news for ABF listeners: "Planet Funky" is already in Heavy Rotation on Radio ABF – tune in now to catch it multiple times a day and let the funk take control of your speakers!

Big shoutout to Betty for keeping the house scene alive with these heaters. Share your reactions, tag her, and let's get this planet grooving.

title: THIS SATURDAY JAN 24 – ABF CLUB GUESTS ARE ABOUT TO BLOW UP!
excerpt: Share House lovers, trance heads and electronic vibe chasers… lock in your Saturday night — ABF Club is back with an absolute fire line-up to kick off 2026 in style! Here’s what’s…
content_html:
House lovers, trance heads and electronic vibe chasers… lock in your Saturday night — ABF Club is back with an absolute fire line-up to kick off 2026 in style!

Here’s what’s dropping this weekend:

  • 8:00 PM – Guest Mix 1 by BIL BV (Trance) The pure trance wizard is here to take you sky-high! Euphoric melodies, epic builds, and massive drops that hit the soul — Bil BV will turn your speakers into a portal to the biggest trance festivals. Get ready to lift off right from the start!
  • 9:00 PM – Guest Mix 2 by ARNAUD JOACHIM (House) The groove sorcerer steps up next. Deep, funky, uplifting house vibes with irresistible selections that make you move. Arnaud Joachim knows exactly how to crank up the temperature and keep the dancefloor energy locked in (even if it’s your living room!).

Saturday January 24, 2026 8:00 PM → 10:00 PM+ (French time) Followed by Laurent Schark at 10:00 PM and resident Tony Jay at 11:00 PM to carry the night through!

The plan is simple: dim the lights, max the volume, grab your favorite drink, and let these two talents transport you through an epic winter evening.

Tune in sharp at 8:00 PM on radioabf.com! Share the word, tag your crew who need this electronic boost this weekend.

We’re counting on you to bring the virtual dancefloor to life… let’s go! ?✨

title: HOT NEW DROP ON RADIO ABF: TONY JAY – CAPTURE, HOLD ME, FEEL ME, REPEAT
excerpt: Share Big news for the ABF family! Fresh heat just landed in our playlists — the brand new single from TONY JAY titled Capture, Hold Me, Feel Me, Repeat is now spinning exclusivel…
content_html:
Big news for the ABF family! Fresh heat just landed in our playlists — the brand new single from TONY JAY titled Capture, Hold Me, Feel Me, Repeat is now spinning exclusively on Radio ABF!

This track is pure fire: deep, hypnotic house grooves with infectious vocal chops, rolling basslines that grab you from the first second, and that addictive build-and-release energy that keeps you locked in loop after loop. The title says it all — once it captures you, holds you, makes you feel it… you’ll hit repeat without even thinking.

TONY JAY delivers his signature sound here: smooth yet driving, emotional yet dancefloor-ready. Perfect for those late-night sessions, warm-up sets, or when you just need music that hits different.

Available right now in heavy rotation on ABF — tune in and let it take over your speakers!

And that’s not all… we’ve also loaded up the playlist with the latest tracks that are killing it right now:

  • William Forest (De La Soul mashup,…)
  • Teckroad
  • Loic Molo
  • Betty Mix
  • …and more coming very soon!

All of these bangers are now in Heavy Rotation alongside Tony Jay’s new drop — non-stop quality house vibes guaranteed.

Don’t sleep on this one. Crank it up, share it with your crew, and tag us when you’re feeling those vibes.

TONY JAY – Capture, Hold Me, Feel Me, Repeat

Fresh tracks from the crew Out now and blasting on Radio ABF!

title: ABF CLUB: TONY JAY JOINS AS NEW SATURDAY NIGHT RESIDENT!
excerpt: Share House family, your Saturday nights just got a serious upgrade — Radio ABF: The DJs' Frequency is proud to announce that TONY JAY is now our brand-new resident DJ every Satur…
content_html:
House family, your Saturday nights just got a serious upgrade — Radio ABF: The DJs' Frequency is proud to announce that TONY JAY is now our brand-new resident DJ every Saturday at 11:00 PM (French time / 23h CET) on ABF Club!

Tony Jay is a true veteran of the French scene: DJ and producer since his teenage years, trained on vinyl, shaped in the Paris underground, with past residencies at iconic spots. His sound spans electro disco, dance house, techno, and afro-tribal underground — always delivered with killer energy, clever edits, bootlegs, originals, and that special touch that turns any set into pure club magic.

Expect high-vibe, groove-heavy journeys that keep the momentum rolling deep into the night — the perfect extension to keep the party alive after the earlier hours.

Updated Saturday Line-up on Radio ABF – ABF Club (French time):

  • 20:00 → GUEST MIX 1
  • 21:00 → GUEST MIX 2
  • 22:00 → LAURENT SCHARK
  • 23:00 → TONY JAY – New Resident Set (every Saturday – non-stop till late!)

Starting this weekend — tune in sharp at radioabf.com (or on your favorite Radio ABF player). Lights low, system cranked, and let the groove take over.

This residency is the next level for keeping the energy alive all night long. Where the groove never stops... now even stronger! ✨

Welcome to the family, Tony Jay — Saturday nights are about to become legendary.

#RadioABF #ABFClub #TonyJay #NewResident #LaurentSchark #GuestMix #HouseMusic #SaturdayNightVibes #WhereTheGrooveNeverStops

title: ABF presents this Friday an exceptional B2B Betty Mix × Teckroad!
excerpt: Share This Friday, January 16, 2026 , starting at 8:00 PM (French time/CET), Radio ABF and the ABF Club concept are bringing you a live session that will shake your speakers: an e…
content_html:
This Friday, January 16, 2026, starting at 8:00 PM (French time/CET), Radio ABF and the ABF Club concept are bringing you a live session that will shake your speakers: an explosive PsyTrance B2B between two beloved talents of the community, Betty Mix and Teckroad!

Betty Mix × Teckroad: when feel-good energy meets timeless groove

  • Betty Mix: The queen of psytrance sets, trance, upgraded progressive remixes, and unstoppable positive energy. With her feel-good style, killer builds, and infectious smile, she turns every moment into an unforgettable party.
  • Teckroad (Patrick Karlson): The veteran of the scene since the 80s, master of psytrance, trance, house, groovy house, funky, and disco house. With his love for vinyl, rare edits, and old-school soul revisited, he brings depth and heart that few DJs still possess.

Together, they promise a unique PsyTrance B2B: the perfect fusion of Betty’s current, festive energy and Teckroad’s deep, warm, nostalgic grooves. Expect magical transitions, exclusive bootlegs, reworked classics, and non-stop adrenaline!

Practical info – don’t miss it

  • Date: Friday, January 16, 2026
  • Time: 8:00 PM → B2B Betty Mix & Teckroad (live on air)
  • Where to listen: Live on radioabf.com (HD, SD, BD, UHD streams)

Get your speakers ready, call your friends, and join us this Friday night. This is pure ABF Club: passion, groove, and good vibes in B2B!

Betty Mix + Teckroad = the session you can’t afford to miss. See you sharp at 8:00 PM on Radio ABF!

#ABFClub #BettyMix #Teckroad #B2B #RadioABF #PsyTrance #Trance #FridayNightVibes 
[Listen live → radioabf.com]
content_text: This Friday, January 16, 2026 , starting at 8:00 PM (French time/CET), Radio ABF and the ABF Club concept are bringing you a live session that will shake your speakers: an explosive PsyTrance B2B between two beloved talents of the community, Betty Mix and Teckroad ! Betty Mix × Teckroad: when feel-good energy meets timeless groove Betty Mix : The queen of psytrance sets, trance, upgraded progressive remixes , and unstoppable positive energy . With her feel-good style, killer builds, and infectious smile, she turns every moment into an unforgettable party. Teckroad (Patrick Karlson): The veteran of the scene since the 80s, master of psytrance, trance, house, groovy house, funky, and disco house . With his love for vinyl, rare edits, and old-school soul revisited, he brings depth and heart that few DJs still possess. Together, they promise a unique PsyTrance B2B : the perfect fusion of Betty’s current, festive energy and Teckroad’s deep, warm, nostalgic grooves. Expect magical transitions, exclusive bootlegs, reworked classics, and non-stop adrenaline! Practical info – don’t miss it Date : Friday, January 16, 2026 Time : 8:00 PM → B2B Betty Mix & Teckroad (live on air) Where to listen : Live on radioabf.com (HD, SD, BD, UHD streams) Get your speakers ready, call your friends, and join us this Friday night. This is pure ABF Club: passion, groove, and good vibes in B2B! Betty Mix + Teckroad = the session you can’t afford to miss. See you sharp at 8:00 PM on Radio ABF! #ABFClub #BettyMix #Teckroad #B2B #RadioABF #PsyTrance #Trance #FridayNightVibes  [Listen live → radioabf.com ]

title: All DJ Biographies for ABF CLUB Residents & Guests Are Now Live on the Website!
excerpt: Share All DJ Biographies for ABF CLUB Residents & Guests Are Now Live on the Website! Dear ABF Family, We’re thrilled to announce that the complete biographies of all our ABF…
content_html:
All DJ Biographies for ABF CLUB Residents & Guests Are Now Live on the Website!

Dear ABF Family,

We’re thrilled to announce that the complete biographies of all our ABF CLUB residents and guests DJs are now available right here on the official Radio ABF website!

Whether you’ve been vibing with their weekly sets for months or just discovered one of our incredible guests, you can now dive deeper into their musical journey, style, influences, and key moments in their career. Residents, historical legends & fire guests… Discover who they are, where their groove comes from, and why they light up Radio ABF every week.

Who’s featured?

Our current lineup includes (among many others):

  • Betty Mix
  • Teckroad
  • JNOES
  • DJ JOEE
  • LP Remix
  • Tsunoo
  • DJ Ari’s Style
  • Jessica Libellule
  • Natasha Rostova
  • Paco Caniza
  • Vik Benno
  • Lex Green
  • Jenny Karol
  • Danijela Deniz
  • …and many more residents, regulars & very special guests!

Each biography is written with love and care to give you a real sense of who these artists are, what drives their sound, and why they fit so perfectly in the ABF CLUB universe.

Head over now to the ARTISTS section on radioabf.com/artists to meet (or rediscover) your favorite DJs in detail!

We’re constantly updating the page as new residents join and guests make their mark, so keep checking back.

Big thanks to every DJ who trusted us with their story — your passion fuels this station every single day.

Let the groove continue!

#ABFClub #RadioABF #Webradio #HouseMusic #ElectronicMusic #DJBiographies #ABFResidents #ABFGuests #ParisElectronicScene

[Listen live now → radioabf.com] [Follow us for more updates → @ABFonAir on all social media]

title: ABF CLUB Special Guests: Tsunoo Returns and LP Remix on Fire this Saturday
excerpt: Share ABF CLUB Guests Mix – Saturday, January 17, 2026: A Special Evening with a True Throwback! This Saturday, January 17, 2026 , starting at 8:00 PM (CET/French time), Radio ABF…
content_html:
ABF CLUB Guests Mix – Saturday, January 17, 2026: A Special Evening with a True Throwback!

This Saturday, January 17, 2026, starting at 8:00 PM (CET/French time), Radio ABF and the ABF CLUB concept are bringing you an unforgettable evening that will light up the airwaves and virtual dancefloors!

For this very special edition, we welcome two talents who perfectly embody both the history and the fresh energy of the French and UK electronic scene:

At 8:00 PM: Guest Mix 1
Tsunoo – The Legendary DJ from Radio ABF (1999)

Tsunoo is a living legend of Radio ABF’s early days. Active on the station as early as 1999, he helped shape the signature dance, house, and electro sound that still defines ABF today. A true pioneer of webradio at a time when streaming barely existed, Tsunoo delivered raw energy, sharp selections, and infectious passion that left a lasting mark on an entire generation of listeners.

After years away from the decks (or keeping a lower profile), he makes a rare and highly anticipated comeback this Saturday. Expect an emotional, nostalgic set packed with timeless classics from the late 90s and early 2000s, underground gems from that golden era, mixed with the authentic feel of a true veteran. A unique opportunity to relive the golden age of French house and understand why Tsunoo remains etched in the hearts of ABF fans.

At 9:00 PM: Guest Mix 2
LP Remix – The Remix Master Who Sets Dancefloors on Fire

Right after Tsunoo, we hand over to LP Remix, one of the most creative and prolific DJs on the current Radio ABF scene. A true specialist of explosive remixes, LP Remix turns today’s hits into unstoppable club weapons: upgraded pop-dance tracks, powerful builds, killer drops, and his signature personal touch that makes every set addictive.

His style? Modern groove, festival-level energy, commercial house and big room influences, always delivered with that extra spark. Whether you’re warming up at home or cranking the volume full blast, LP Remix knows exactly how to keep the party at maximum intensity for a full non-stop hour!

Practical Info – Don’t Miss It

  • Date: Saturday, January 17, 2026
  • Schedule: 8:00 PM – Tsunoo (historic set) / 9:00 PM – LP Remix (fire remixes)
  • Where to Listen: Live on https://radioabf.com (HD, SD, BD, UHD streams available)

Get your speakers ready, grab your headphones, call your friends… This ABF CLUB night promises to be the perfect bridge between yesterday and today: authentic nostalgia with Tsunoo, followed by a modern explosion with LP Remix.

Tune in sharp at 8:00 PM on Radio ABF – because music has no age, it just has groove!

#ABFClub #TsunooComeback #LPRemix #RadioABF #Dancefloor2026

title: MIKEL CUGGA & VIK BENNO are guests on ABF CLUB this Saturday night!
excerpt: Share THIS SATURDAY NIGHT – ABF CLUB IS TURNING UP THE HEAT! House heads, groove lovers and weekend warriors… clear your schedule because this Saturday night (January 10, 2026), A…
content_html:
THIS SATURDAY NIGHT – ABF CLUB IS TURNING UP THE HEAT!

House heads, groove lovers and weekend warriors… clear your schedule because this Saturday night (January 10, 2026), ABF Club is delivering a proper two-hour heater with two exceptional guests!

Here’s the line-up that’s about to set your speakers on fire:

8:00 PM – Guest Mix 1 by MIKEL CUGGA

A true underground house soldier, Mikel Cugga brings his signature blend of tech house, funky grooves, deep vibes and vintage soul. Known for his appearances on major Beatport compilations and his ability to keep the energy smooth yet powerful, this set is guaranteed to get you moving from the very first drop. Pure club alchemy incoming.

9:00 PM – Guest Mix 2 by VIK BENNO

The queen of feel-good house. Uplifting, happy, tribal-tech grooves, funky deep cuts and selections that make you grin while your body does the rest. Vik Benno is pure positivity on the decks — the kind of set that turns your flat into the best afters in town.

Saturday – January 10, 2026

8:00 PM → 10:00 PM (french time / 19:00 UTC) (and we’ll keep going if the vibe demands it )

ABF Club – where real house music lives.

Plan? Simple.

Lights low, volume up, good shoes on (even if you’re staying home), and let Mikel & Vik take you on a proper journey through the best of contemporary house.

Tune in sharp at 8 PM on ABF! Tag your crew, spread the word — this is the Saturday night soundtrack you didn’t know you needed. See you on the virtual dancefloor… let’s make it count!  

#ABFClub #MikelCugga #VikBenno #HouseMusic #SaturdayNightVibes #GuestMix #RadioABF

Play on radioabf.com

title: Exciting Update: Radio ABF Unveils a Sleeker, Music-Optimized Website
excerpt: Share Radio ABF, the go-to destination for alternative bass frequencies and cutting-edge electronic sounds, is thrilled to announce the launch of its revamped website at radioabf.…
content_html:
Radio ABF, the go-to destination for alternative bass frequencies and cutting-edge electronic sounds, is thrilled to announce the launch of its revamped website at radioabf.com. Designed with a fresh, minimalist aesthetic and tailored specifically for music enthusiasts worldwide, the new site promises a seamless and immersive listening experience like never before.

A Minimalist Makeover for Maximum Focus

Gone are the cluttered layouts of the past. The updated Radio ABF site embraces minimalism, stripping away unnecessary elements to put the spotlight squarely on what matters most: the music. Clean lines, intuitive navigation, and a friendly interface ensure that users can dive straight into the beats without distractions. Whether you're browsing on desktop, tablet, or mobile, the responsive design adapts effortlessly, making it easier than ever to explore our diverse lineup of shows and DJs.

Optimized for Music Lovers Everywhere

At the heart of this redesign is a powerful focus on music optimization. We've enhanced our streaming capabilities with high-quality audio fluxes, including the newly introduced ABF UHD 728K FLAC for crystal-clear sound. Advanced audio processing boosts clarity, deepens bass, and balances the overall mix, delivering studio-grade quality right to your device.

Key features include:

Effortless Streaming: Instant access to live broadcasts and on-demand playlists featuring genres like bass, electronic, mashups, and international influences from artists such as LP Remix and Tamio Yamashita.

Discover More: Curated sections for DJ profiles, show schedules, and exclusive content, all just a click away.

Global Accessibility: Built with international audiences in mind, the site supports now only english language in key areas and ensures low-latency streaming for listeners across continents.

This upgrade reflects our commitment to evolving with our community, providing a platform that's not only visually appealing but also technically superior for uninterrupted vibes.

Join the Frequency Revolution !

Whether you're a longtime fan of Alternative Bass Fréquence or discovering us for the first time, we invite you to visit radioabf.com today. Tune in, turn up the volume, and let the bass take over. For the latest updates, follow us on Instagram (@abfonair) and Facebook (Radio ABF).

Radio ABF: Where alternative bass meets global rhythm.

For media inquiries, contact: contact@radioabf.com

title: Audio update: HD, UHD and proxy streams now on ABF!
excerpt: Share Great news for Radio ABF (Alternative Bass Fréquence) listeners! We're thrilled to announce the launch of our new high-quality audio streams for an even more immersive sound…
content_html:
Great news for Radio ABF (Alternative Bass Fréquence) listeners!

We're thrilled to announce the launch of our new high-quality audio streams for an even more immersive sound experience:

ABF HD 320K MP3: High definition quality for clear and powerful sound.

ABF UHD 728K FLAC: Ultra high definition in lossless format, perfect for demanding audiophiles.

ABF SD 128K MP3: Standard quality for smooth listening anywhere.

ABF BD 32K AAC+: Low bitrate optimized for slow connections.

And for those listening from the office or behind a firewall/proxy, we've added "bypass" PROXY streams:

ABF PROXY 320K MP3
ABF PROXY 128K MP3
ABF PROXY 32K AAC+
ABF PROXY 728K FLAC

Plus, we've introduced advanced new audio processing that enhances clarity, bass depth, and overall balance for a more professional and captivating sound.

Head over to the player at the bottom of the site radioabf.com to find all the stream URLs and start listening right away!

What do you think? Share your feedback in the comments! #RadioABF #AudioHD #UHD #ProxyStreams #BassFrequence #ElectroMusic

title: Radio ABF's brand new Japanese night rendezvous!
excerpt: Share ABF CLUB [ MADE IN JAPAN ] – Radio ABF's brand new Japanese night rendezvous EVERY SUNDAY from 8 PM to 12 AM (French time/CET) – https://radioabf.com Radio ABF opens its air…
content_html:
ABF CLUB [ MADE IN JAPAN ] – Radio ABF's brand new Japanese night rendezvous EVERY SUNDAY from 8 PM to 12 AM (French time/CET) – https://radioabf.com

Radio ABF opens its airwaves to the Japanese night with a 100% Nippon show: ABF CLUB [MADE IN JAPAN].

Four resident DJs based in Tokyo, Osaka, and Nagoya take over the decks for 4 non-stop hours:

  • Hitomi Nagayama – @zephyr_jpn
  • H I D E K I – @hideki.jpn
  • Tamio Yamashita – @tamio_yamashita
  • DJ Darkness – @djdarknessofc

Every Sunday, they bring you a raw, unfiltered live journey straight from Japan — from the buzzing clubs of Shibuya, the massive warehouses of Osaka, to the underground parties of Nagoya.

ABF CLUB [ MADE IN JAPAN ] Every Sunday 8 PM – 12 AM (French time) Exclusively on Radio ABF – Alternative Bass Fréquence https://radioabf.com

See you every Sunday evening. Japan starts at 8 PM. #ABFClub #MadeInJapan #RadioABF

title: ABF CLUB Lineup: Every Night from Monday to Sunday on Radio ABF!
excerpt: Share Discover the Full ABF CLUB Lineup: Every Night from Monday to Sunday on Radio ABF! Radio ABF – Alternative Bass Fréquence – turns your evenings into a non-stop club experien…
content_html:
Discover the Full ABF CLUB Lineup: Every Night from Monday to Sunday on Radio ABF!

Radio ABF – Alternative Bass Fréquence – turns your evenings into a non-stop club experience with ABF CLUB, the daily prime-time slot that brings fresh, high-energy electronic music straight to your speakers.

From Monday to Sunday, starting at 22:00 (10 PM) French time (CET) ( = 21:00 UTC), the ABF CLUB residents and guests take over for two solid hours of mixes packed with house, techno, bass, and underground vibes. On Saturdays, the party starts earlier with guest mixes, and Sundays feature the special extended ABF CLUB [MADE IN JAPAN] takeover from 20:00 to 00:00.

Here’s the complete weekly evening lineup:

Monday

  • 22:00 → ABF CLUB – JNOES
  • 23:00 → ABF CLUB – DEGIANNY

Tuesday

  • 22:00 → ABF CLUB – TECKROAD
  • 23:00 → ABF CLUB – THE SPYMBOYS

Wednesday

  • 22:00 → ABF CLUB – JEAN-JEROME
  • 23:00 → ABF CLUB – WILLIAM FOREST

Thursday

  • 22:00 → ABF CLUB – DJ KOLESKY
  • 23:00 → ABF CLUB – C-DRYK

Friday

  • 22:00 → ABF CLUB – BETTY MIX
  • 23:00 → ABF CLUB – DJ JOEE

Saturday

  • 20:00 → ABF CLUB – GUEST MIX 1
  • 21:00 → ABF CLUB – GUEST MIX 2
  • 22:00 → ABF CLUB – LAURENT SCHARK
  • 23:00 → ABF CLUB – TONY JAY

Sunday

  • 20:00 → ABF CLUB [MADE IN JAPAN] – ZEPHYR
  • 21:00 → ABF CLUB [MADE IN JAPAN] – HIDEKI
  • 22:00 → ABF CLUB [MADE IN JAPAN] – TAMIO YAMASHITA
  • 23:00 → ABF CLUB [MADE IN JAPAN] – DJ DARKNESS

Whether you're into groovy warm-ups, deep bass assaults, or raw Japanese underground energy, there's an ABF CLUB vibe for every night of the week.

Tune in live every evening in HD/FLAC quality: → https://radioabf.com

Missed a set? Replays are usually available on the station's Mixcloud or the individual DJs' pages.

Which resident are you most excited to catch this week? Drop your favorite in the comments and join the night session!

#ABFClub #RadioABF #AlternativeBass #DailyClubVibes #ElectronicMusic

title: ABF – Alternative Bass Fréquence is BACK!
excerpt: Share After several long years on hiatus, the webradio that once set so many electronic nights on fire is officially returning in 2026 — stronger, fresher, and more passionate tha…
content_html:
After several long years on hiatus, the webradio that once set so many electronic nights on fire is officially returning in 2026 — stronger, fresher, and more passionate than ever!

Yes, Radio ABF is reborn to take you back to what has always made our hearts race: the very best in electronic music, no compromises.

House, Tech House, Deep House, Techno, Drum’n’Bass, Lounge… everything is unapologetically electro, carefully curated, and designed to make you dance or drift away, depending on the moment and the mood.

The DJs are back every single night From 10 PM to midnight (French time / CET), our residents and guests hit the decks for two hours of pure musical passion. A daily program that picks up exactly where we left off: energy, HD/FLAC sound quality, and total creative freedom — that’s our DNA.

New era, new radio

  • Brand new, modern, and smoother website
  • Fresh team full of excitement and ideas
  • New sound… or maybe not! (we’re keeping the authenticity that made us special)
  • And above all: a true return to our roots

At ABF, you will never find intrusive ads or mainstream commercial tracks. Here, music is chosen with heart, mixes are crafted with passion, and artists enjoy complete freedom.

We’re back for your greatest pleasure (we hope!), ready to plunge you (back) into our alternative bass & electronic universe that has always united us.

Ready to vibe again? Connect now and every night and day 24/7: → https://radioabf.com

Welcome home. Real electronic music is taking back its place.

#ABFisBack #AlternativeBassFrequence #ElectronicMusic #NoAdsNoCommercial #WeAreBack

 

History of Radio ABF – Alternative Bass Fréquence

Radio ABF (Alternative Bass Fréquence) is an iconic French webradio dedicated to electronic music, particularly dance, house, electro, techno, bass, and related genres. It embodies the pioneering spirit of the very first online radios in France at the turn of the 2000s.

Origins (1999–2000): The beginnings under Loïc Molo’s impulse

Radio ABF was born from the vision of Loïc Molo (known online as @LoicMolo), a passionate radio enthusiast and electronic music lover. Loïc began his radio journey in 1999 at Radio FG, where he worked in production and weekend show hosting. At a time when ADSL was rare and streaming was in its infancy, he already offered early listeners downloadable 30-minute “home-made” shows (funk, reggae, hip-hop, techno…) — a primitive form of podcasting before the term even existed.

In 2000, Loïc officially launched Radio ABF – Alternative Bass Fréquence, a live webradio focused on electronic music. The ABF-ALTERNATIVE BASS FREQUENCE association was officially registered on June 2, 1999 (headquartered in France), with the mission of promoting electronic artists through the website, radio, events, and other initiatives.

From 2000 to 2008, ABF delivered a sharp, alternative programming that quickly built a loyal community thanks to its independence and high audio quality. It became one of the true pioneers of French webradios specialized in electronic/dance music.

Evolution into M2 Radio (2008)

In 2008, the project evolved. In partnership with Alexandre Martinat (founder of Fréquence3), Loïc decided to create a broader bouquet with multiple music themes. Radio ABF officially ceased broadcasting on January 1, 2008, to make way for M2 Radio, an association under the 1901 law that incorporated several webradios (including ex sub-brands like ABF Underground for electro/techno and ABF Analog for 80s music). M2 Radio then became a major player in French digital radio, mastering the full technical chain (broadcasting, servers, streaming).

The comeback and relaunch in 2026

After years of absence (or hibernation) under the ABF name, Radio ABF made a powerful return in 2026, relaunched by Loïc Molo himself — the historical founder and current manager. This revival is driven by a desire to go back to the roots: authentic bass/electronic programming, DJ sets, live sessions, and a strong, active community.

As of January 2026, Radio ABF is live and accessible at https://radioabf.com with high-quality streams (HD, SD, etc.), featuring concepts such as ABF Club, residencies and guests (Tsunoo, LP Remix, Betty Mix, JNOES, DJ JOEE…), and international spotlights (Made in Japan, etc.). It remains 100% independent, free, and passionate — true to the spirit of the web radio pioneers.

In summary: A legacy spanning over 25 years

From 1999 (early precursor at FG with the first “podcasts”) to 2000 (official ABF launch), through 2008 (transition to M2), and finally 2026 (full relaunch), Radio ABF represents perseverance and pure passion for alternative frequencies. With more than 25 years of experience in radio (production, hosting, management), Loïc Molo continues to keep this station alive as a dedicated space for discovery and electronic groove.

A station that grew alongside the internet — and never stopped vibrating on the digital airwaves.

#RadioABF #AlternativeBassFréquence #PioneerWebradio #LoicMolo
content_text: After several long years on hiatus, the webradio that once set so many electronic nights on fire is officially returning in 2026 — stronger, fresher, and more passionate than ever! Yes, Radio ABF is reborn to take you back to what has always made our hearts race: the very best in electronic music, no compromises. House, Tech House, Deep House, Techno, Drum’n’Bass, Lounge… everything is unapologetically electro , carefully curated, and designed to make you dance or drift away, depending on the moment and the mood. The DJs are back every single night From 10 PM to midnight (French time / CET), our residents and guests hit the decks for two hours of pure musical passion. A daily program that picks up exactly where we left off: energy, HD/FLAC sound quality, and total creative freedom — that’s our DNA. New era, new radio Brand new, modern, and smoother website Fresh team full of excitement and ideas New sound… or maybe not! (we’re keeping the authenticity that made us special) And above all: a true return to our roots At ABF, you will never find intrusive ads or mainstream commercial tracks. Here, music is chosen with heart, mixes are crafted with passion, and artists enjoy complete freedom. We’re back for your greatest pleasure (we hope!), ready to plunge you (back) into our alternative bass & electronic universe that has always united us. Ready to vibe again? Connect now and every night and day 24/7: → https://radioabf.com Welcome home.
